gamerule.foxGlowDuration: [FoxGlow] Duration of the glowing effect on foxes (seconds)
gamerule.doPlayersGlow: [FoxGlow] Enable the glow effect of glow berries for players
gamerule.customColorGlow: [FoxGlow] Enable a custom color for the glow effect for players & foxes (#eda205)
gamerule.randomColorGlow: [FoxGlow] Use a random custom color for the glow effect if customColorGlow is enabled
